message:
If you are using .NET and need to integrate with social sites like Twitter, Facebook, and Open-ID, this is a very nice library to use, for ASP.NET MVC and Websites.

they have just released V4, check it out
http://www.dotnetopenauth.net/oauth/dotnetopenauth-4-0-released/
name: DotNetOpenAuth 4.0 released | DotNetOpenAuth
caption: www.dotnetopenauth.net
description: DotNetOpenAuth 4.0 has shipped.  There are breaking changes, mostly in your web.config file if you've previously had entries related to DotNetOpenAuth, so
